Inventory Effect Items- Are they worthwhile?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Monster Rancher DS: General QA: Inventory Effect Items- Are they worthwhile?
By Firefairy on Sunday, September 19, 2010 - 09:48 pm:

I know that in previous games, only some of the inventory items (usually the ones related to rest) were really worth the inventory space if you were being careful about stress and fatigue. Has anyone been able to determine yet which ones are worthwhile in MRDS, whether they are cumulative, how much effect they have, etc.?

By Thorr on Monday, September 20, 2010 - 04:45 am:

They are all greatly important. You should get all 7 ASAP.

By BlueLeafeon on Wednesday, September 22, 2010 - 08:00 am:

If you have multiple kinds of a single item, do their bonuses stack, or is it just a waste of space?

By Thorr on Wednesday, September 22, 2010 - 08:45 am:

You only need one of each unique item.
